New Records: Jalen Green is averaging 22.6 points a game, while shooting an impressive 38.2 percent from deep on 9.5 attempts per game.
Key Match Events: The Rockets won 13 out of 15 games in March, with Green averaging 27.7 points, 6.3 rebounds and 3.9 assists per game.
Pre-Game Insights: The Rockets are expected to compete for a playoff spot after a turnaround last season saw them finish a few games out of the Play-In Tournament.
Post-Match Reflections: Green has become dependable. Necessary. It felt good, It’s never too late for your blessings to come.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rockets reduced Green’s cap hold in the process and negotiated an extension at an amount below the maximum allotment.
Others: Green has taken his game to the next level for the Rockets, and his efficiency has spiked as well, the biggest indicator of his growth.
Green has become one of the most dependable players on both ends of the floor for coach Ime Udoka.
Green is focused on what he can control, and he’s not paying attention to the outside expectations.
